Question: In 1934, this person married Dolores (DeFina) Reade, who had been one of his co-stars on Broadway in Roberta.
Hints: This person had a reputation as a womanizer and continued to see other women in spite of his marriage.
This person's career in broadcasting began on radio in 1934.
Two years later, he was present at the opening of the ____ Gallery of American Entertainment at the Library of Congress.
